metadata.synopsis: Edge-case: before doing the LakeBrief, player killed Marcus. His corpse is in Isobel's room, so she found it when she came back. As the player approaches, this AD plays to give some life to this picture of Isobel near Marcus' corpse
metadata.how_to_trigger: Defeat (kill or KO) marcus in Isobel's room before triggering BriefAtLake. Let Isobel go to her room. If she's near Marcus, this plays when the player approaches
